comment: for me easily one of the best rye available in the u.s.

Vanilla and Caramel on the nose.
Spicy on the back end with lingering spicy notes

Do you enjoy a smooth, high proof rye? If so, this is not for you. It’s right there on the label: rough. Somehow they’ve managed to capture the flavors, smells, and rage from the Long Island experience and put it in a bottle.
Rare to find a good cask strength rye, especially one not distilled at MGP. Even though it’s 120 proof, there’s really not much of a hug. Flavors are abundant
[Whiskey Live NY 2018] - LIS has been putting out some fun drams over the years, but this is not one of them!
